title: The Frenchwoman
description: From her chldhood in the grim slums of pre-Revolution Paris, Julienne rises to find work as a seamstress and the dangerous attention of Marie Antoinette. Her secret pledges lead her to Azilum in Pennsylvania, a community of exiles awaiting the arrival of their queen. Based on the history of the actual community of French Azilum.
author: Jeanne Mackin
